name: African Lion
description: The African lion is a majestic creature known for its golden fur and distinct roar. It is native to the grasslands of Africa.

name: Asian Lion
description: The Asian lion, also known as the Indian lion, is a critically endangered species. It has a smaller population and is found in the Gir Forest of India.

name: White Lion
description: The white lion is a rare color mutation of the African lion. It is known for its striking white fur and is considered sacred in some cultures.

name: Barbary Lion
description: The Barbary lion, also known as the Atlas lion, was native to North Africa but is now considered extinct in the wild. It was known for its thick mane.

name: Mountain Lion
description: The mountain lion, also known as the cougar or puma, is a large cat species found in various mountainous regions of North and South America.

name: Siberian Tiger
description: The Siberian tiger is the largest of all tiger subspecies. It is native to the forests of Siberia and is known for its thick fur.

name: Bengal Tiger
description: The Bengal tiger is one of the most iconic tiger subspecies. It is found in various regions of the Indian subcontinent.

name: Sumatran Tiger
description: The Sumatran tiger is the smallest of all tiger subspecies and is native to the island of Sumatra in Indonesia.

name: Jaguar
description: The jaguar is a large cat species native to the Americas. It is known for its powerful build and distinctive rosette patterns on its coat.

name: Cheetah
description: The cheetah is the fastest land animal, capable of reaching speeds of up to 70 miles per hour. It is native to Africa and parts of Iran.

name: Leopard
habitat: Africa, Asia, and parts of the Middle East
description: The leopard is a versatile and adaptable big cat, found in various regions of Africa, Asia, and parts of the Middle East.

name: Snow Leopard
habitat: Mountainous regions of Central and South Asia
description: The snow leopard is a rare and elusive big cat, known for its thick fur and adaptations to cold mountain environments.

name: Lynx
description: Lynx is a genus of medium-sized wild cats. They are known for their distinctive tufted ears and short tails.

name: Cougar
description: The cougar, also known as the puma or mountain lion, is a large cat species found throughout the Americas.
